statements: SELECT * FROM SalesData ORDER BY transaction_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT product_name, sales_amount FROM SalesData WHERE sales_amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28'
SELECT transaction_id, product_name, sales_amount FROM SalesData WHERE sales_amount < 500 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT DISTINCT product_name FROM SalesData
SELECT * FROM SalesData ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, sales_amount DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_name, SUM(sales_amount) AS total_sales FROM SalesData GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_sales > 1000
SELECT transaction_id, DATE_FORMAT(transaction_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date FROM SalesData WHERE sales_amount > 500 ORDER BY transaction_id ASC
SELECT AVG(sales_amount) AS average_sales FROM SalesData WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%'
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount, sale_date FROM sales_data;
SELECT sale_id, product_name, sale_amount, sale_date FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_data;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_data WHERE LENGTH(customer_phone) > 10 ORDER BY customer_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_sales > 5000 ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT s.product_name, c.customer_name FROM sales_data s JOIN customer_data c ON s.sale_id = c.customer_id WHERE s.sale_amount > 2000 ORDER BY c.customer_name ASC, s.sale_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM pricing_strategies WHERE strategy_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT trend_description FROM sales_trends WHERE trend_id = 5;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount, sale_date FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;
SELECT MAX(sale_amount) AS max_sale_amount, MIN(sale_amount) AS min_sale_amount FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_name, COUNT(*) AS total_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data sd JOIN pricing_strategies ps ON sd.product_name = ps.strategy_name WHERE sd.sale_amount > 500 AND ps.strategy_date > '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC, total_amount
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, total_amount FROM sales_data WHERE quantity > 10
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM product_details WHERE category = 'Electronics'
SELECT customer_name, email, address FROM customer_info LIMIT 5
SELECT forecast_date, product_id, predicted_quantity, predicted_amount FROM sales_forecast
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC, total_amount DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, unit_price FROM product_details WHERE unit_price > 50;
SELECT customer_name, email, address FROM customer_info WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT product_name, category, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity_sold FROM sales_data JOIN product_details ON sales_data.product_id = product_details.product_id GROUP BY category;

SELECT customer_name, SUM(predicted_amount) AS total_forecast_amount FROM sales_forecast JOIN customer_info ON sales_forecast.forecast_id = customer_info.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name ORDER BY total_forecast_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM SalesData;
SELECT product_id, sale_date, total_amount FROM SalesData WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT strategy_name, target_market, price_adjustment FROM PricingStrategies ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Products WHERE price < 50
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name
SELECT trend_description, trend_rating FROM SalesTrends WHERE trend_rating >= 4
SELECT strategy_name, target_market, start_date FROM PricingStrategies WHERE price_adjustment BETWEEN 0.1 AND 0.5 ORDER BY start_date DESC
